Columns.Description: The time (UTC) at which this log was sent to Log Analytics
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The root activity ID of the operation which caused metadata change (for example: 2217ed0d-888f-4c3d-8776-973471be556e)
Columns.Name: RootActivityId

Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) at which the metadata operation completed
Columns.Name: OperationTimestamp

Columns.Description: The name of the database changed following the event
Columns.Name: DatabaseName

Columns.Description: The entity name that the operation was executed on, before the change
Columns.Name: EntityName

Columns.Description: The new entity name after the change
Columns.Name: UpdatedEntityName

Columns.Description: The version of the entity (entity properties) before the change
Columns.Name: OriginalEntityVersion

Columns.Description: The new metadata version (DB/cluster) following the change
Columns.Name: EntityVersion

Columns.Description: The entity container name (entity=column, container=table), or the database name
Columns.Name: EntityContainerName

Columns.Description: The state of the entity (entity properties) before the change
Columns.Name: OriginalEntityState

Columns.Description: The new state after the change
Columns.Name: UpdatedEntityState

Columns.Description: The executed control command that triggered the metadata change
Columns.Name: ChangeCommand

Columns.Description: The user that executed the control command
Columns.Name: User

Columns.Description: The principal (user/app) that executed the control command
Columns.Name: Principal

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
